US BANK HOLIDAY: October 9, 2023 – Incoming and outgoing USD payments paused
Bitstamp incoming and outgoing USD payments paused on Monday, October 9, 2023, due to a public holiday in the US.

Due to the upcoming public holiday (Columbus Day) in the US on Monday, October 9, 2023, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for incoming and outgoing USD payments will not be available.

EUR SEPA transfers, GBP FPS transfers, credit card, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and PayPal transfers will remain unaffected.

If you need any help or additional information, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net.

We wish a happy Columbus Day to all our US customers!
US Bank Holiday: Oct 9 2023 Incoming/outgoing USD payments paused
